headline.main: Referee Briefly Halts Dortmund Game at Leverkusen
headline.print_headline: Referee Briefly Halts Dortmund Game at Leverkusen

docs.snippet: Bayer Leverkusen coach Roger Schmidt's refusal to go the stands after being sent off prompted referee Felix Zwayer to briefly halt the Bundesliga match with Borussia Dortmund on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bayer Leverkusen coach Roger Schmidt's refusal to go the stands after being sent off prompted referee Felix Zwayer to briefly halt the Bundesliga match with Borussia Dortmund on Sunday.

headline.main: Recordings at Issue in Home Invasion Killer's New Trial Bid
headline.print_headline: Recordings at Issue in Home Invasion Killer's New Trial Bid

docs.snippet: A Connecticut judge will consider the request for a new trial from a man convicted in a brutal home invasion triple killing who said recordings of police phone calls that were believed to have been destroyed in a lightning strike would have been c...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Connecticut judge will consider the request for a new trial from a man convicted in a brutal home invasion triple killing who said recordings of police phone calls that were believed to have been destroyed in a lightning strike would have been crucial to his defense.

headline.main: Rugby-Smith Called Into France Squad Amid Eligibility Doubts
headline.print_headline: Rugby-Smith Called Into France Squad Amid Eligibility Doubts

docs.snippet: France have called up Samoa-born David Smith to the squad for their next Six Nations game against Wales amid doubts about the Castres wing's eligibility to represent the country....
docs.lead_paragraph: France have called up Samoa-born David Smith to the squad for their next Six Nations game against Wales amid doubts about the Castres wing's eligibility to represent the country.

headline.main: Police Arrest Suspect in Deadly Las Vegas Strip Shooting
headline.print_headline: Police Arrest Suspect in Deadly Las Vegas Strip Shooting

docs.snippet: Police have made an arrest in a car-to-car shooting just outside the Las Vegas Strip that left two women dead and a man critically wounded....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police have made an arrest in a car-to-car shooting just outside the Las Vegas Strip that left two women dead and a man critically wounded.

headline.main: Jaguares Aim for Playoffs in Debut Season
headline.print_headline: Jaguares Aim for Playoffs in Debut Season

docs.snippet: New Super Rugby franchise Jaguares are targeting a playoff place in their debut season in the expanded southern hemisphere rugby competition, says coach Raul Perez....
docs.lead_paragraph: New Super Rugby franchise Jaguares are targeting a playoff place in their debut season in the expanded southern hemisphere rugby competition, says coach Raul Perez.

headline.main: 'Brexit' Odds Shorten as London Mayor Johnson Supports 'Out' Campaign
headline.print_headline: 'Brexit' Odds Shorten as London Mayor Johnson Supports 'Out' Campaign

docs.snippet: The odds of Britain leaving the European Union shortened on Sunday after reports that influential London mayor Boris Johnson would back the 'leave' campaign, bookmaker Ladbrokes said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The odds of Britain leaving the European Union shortened on Sunday after reports that influential London mayor Boris Johnson would back the 'leave' campaign, bookmaker Ladbrokes said.

headline.main: Massachusetts Plans Rattlesnake Colony on Uninhabited Island
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts Plans Rattlesnake Colony on Uninhabited Island

docs.snippet: A plan by the state to establish a colony of venomous timber rattlesnakes on an off-limits island in Massachusetts' largest body of water has some rattled by visions of dangerous serpents slithering through the surrounding woods, attacking hikers,...
docs.lead_paragraph: A plan by the state to establish a colony of venomous timber rattlesnakes on an off-limits island in Massachusetts' largest body of water has some rattled by visions of dangerous serpents slithering through the surrounding woods, attacking hikers, fishermen and hunters.

headline.main: 10 Years on, Iraq Scarred From Attack on Shiite Shrine
headline.print_headline: 10 Years on, Iraq Scarred From Attack on Shiite Shrine

docs.snippet: Ten years after Sunni extremists blew up a revered Shiite shrine, igniting the worst sectarian violence Iraq had ever seen, the country remains deeply divided, with the Islamic State group facing off against increasingly powerful Shiite militias....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ten years after Sunni extremists blew up a revered Shiite shrine, igniting the worst sectarian violence Iraq had ever seen, the country remains deeply divided, with the Islamic State group facing off against increasingly powerful Shiite militias.

headline.main: Fallen US WWII Hero's Army Dog Tag Found on Pacific Island
headline.print_headline: Fallen US WWII Hero's Army Dog Tag Found on Pacific Island

docs.snippet: Dorothy Hollingsworth was just 7 when her brother Tom left the family farm in Indiana to join the Army a few months before the United States entered World War II. She never saw him again....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dorothy Hollingsworth was just 7 when her brother Tom left the family farm in Indiana to join the Army a few months before the United States entered World War II. She never saw him again.

headline.main: Kyrgios Captures First ATP Title in Marseille
headline.print_headline: Kyrgios Captures First ATP Title in Marseille

docs.snippet: Australian Nick Kyrgios claimed his maiden ATP title when he beat Croatian fourth seed Marin CIlic 6-2 7-6(3) to win the Marseille Open on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australian Nick Kyrgios claimed his maiden ATP title when he beat Croatian fourth seed Marin CIlic 6-2 7-6(3) to win the Marseille Open on Sunday.
